definition: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong1 shang1 Yin2 hang2

sentences.english: You can deposit the cash in any branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank.
sentences.chinese: 現金可交到任何一家工商銀行分理處。

sentences.english: But he said that Hong Kong is one of the bank's 'priority' markets.
sentences.chinese: 不過姜建清表示香港是工商銀行的重點市場之一。

sentences.english: You can apply for it in the ICBC Peony Credit Card Department. The address is Beijing Road NO.
sentences.chinese: 請到工商銀行信用卡營業部辦理，地址是北京路8號。

sentences.english: Hello! Welcome to East City District Branch savings office. I am No. 8 clerk.
sentences.chinese: 我叫王華，是工商銀行城東支行儲蓄所儲蓄員。

sentences.english: Which cities that ICBC has opened book-entry bond service ?
sentences.chinese: 工商銀行在哪些城市開辦記賬式債券業務？

sentences.english: I am Wang Hua, a bank clerk of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, East City District Branch Savings Office.
sentences.chinese: 我叫王華，是工商銀行城東支行儲蓄所儲蓄員。

sentences.english: Please go to the international Department of ICBC Beijing Branch.
sentences.chinese: 請到工商銀行北京分行國際業務部辦理此項業務。

definition: Bank of China/abbr. for 中國銀行|中国银行[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2]
abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
China United Telecommunications Corporation/aka China Unicom or Unicom/abbr. for 中國聯通|中国联通
to settle a bill/to close an account
Xingye county in Yulin 玉林[Yu4 lin2], Guangxi
